articles.author: Brian Wang
articles.summary: Brian Wang has had over 90% accuracy with public predictions on public websites like Metaculus and Manifold. OpenAI O3 model has shown that greater than human PHD reasoning is possible but it takes 30 minutes to infer the answer. I forecast an increase to 1 million GPU AI training from 100,000 at present.
